Action.body: I think this issue was completed as part of INDY-1916. ~ashcherbakov , do you think something additional should be done?

Action.author: esplinr
Action.body: Validator-Info provides lots of information to people with the role of Steward and Network Monitor, but there could be security concerns with providing it to people with no role on the network. Therefore we've decided not to expose additional information at this time.
